name: MongoDB Atlas
description: Integrate with MongoDB Atlas to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Clusters
tools.description: List all clusters in a MongoDB Atlas project. Returns cluster names, states, MongoDB versions, and provider settings.

tools.name: Get Cluster
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific MongoDB Atlas cluster by name.

tools.name: List Databases
tools.description: List databases in a MongoDB Atlas cluster. Returns database names and sizes.

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all projects (groups) accessible to the authenticated Atlas user.

tools.name: Get Metrics
tools.description: Get performance metrics for a MongoDB Atlas cluster process. Returns metrics such as connections, opcounters, and memory usage.
